titles.title: Automatic Defibrillation in Adam's Memory Act

bill.summary: (This measure has not been amended since it was introduced in the Senate on January 29, 2003. The summary of that version is repeated here.)Automatic Defibrillation in Adam's Memory Act - Amends the Public Health Service Act to authorize the use of certain grant funds to establish a national information clearinghouse that provides information to increase public access to defibrillation in schools.
